author: .lanski
content: Hey Guys - from DAppNode we'd be super keen on helping or being involved. I'm not sure how exactly I can collaborate but I will keep an eye in here. Unfortunately, the technical people's bandwidth is pretty full right now so I can only offer non-technical help (maybe not super useful at this stage).

author: .lanski
content: One of the things I can think of is to make DAppNode packages of the merge testnets to try in our userbase's hardware

author: raulj
content:
Update <@!203220829473996800> and <@!425572898787426305>:
https://github.com/rauljordan/eth-faucet faucet is complete now. Fully configurable and comes with a ready React and a ready Angular project as reference

author: m.kalinin
content: This is great as I am going to update a localnet with recent Teku+Catalyst, it uses docker-compose and I will be able to test faucet there
